explains: n. 剪贴板；附有纸夹的笔记板

sentences.en: She produced a clipboard with a sheet of ruled paper attached.
sentences.cn: 她制作一个夹着一张横格纸的剪贴板。

sentences.en: Here's a neat little use of the system clipboard.
sentences.cn: 这里简单地利用一下系统剪贴板。

sentences.en: Mockups can be exported to clipboard or to a PNG file.
sentences.cn: 原型可以输出到剪贴板或者导出为PNG格式。
